ygData.msgSnippet: As Fracturcon lands in front of the Ark, about 200 yards from the entrance to the old maximal base, Fracturcon powers his electro-mace & charges his plasma

From: "Michael Stadnik" <mstadnik@...>

As Fracturcon lands in front of the Ark, about 200 yards from the entrance =
to the old maximal base, Fracturcon powers his electro-mace & charges his p=
lasma cannon to the max.  He doesn't want to take any chances, plus his int=
ernal sensors aren't working at full capacity yet, something must have gone=
 wrong with his protoform during his emergance from his stasis pod.  "Damn,=
 I guess I'll just have to make do with only my Optical sensors....unless..=
."  Suddenly Fracturcon transforms into his Beast mode, "If I can't track t=
he intruders with my senors then I'll just track them with my nose...even t=
ransformers have an odor to them."  As Fracturcon begins his walk towards t=
he entrance to the Ark he prepares himself to go back to beats mode, in cas=
e a welcome party decides to welcome him.  "No matter", Fracturcon thinks t=
o himself, "I'm sure everyone will straighten up as soon as they realize th=
e Butcher Of Cyerpost 3 is here with them."  And with that Fracturcon begin=
s to giggle a most disturbing of laughs that would even make Megatron take =
a second look.  Onward towards the Ark....
